item.name: Vicious Brass Knuckles +1
item.text:
Unarmed: When you make an unarmed attack you can choose to deal the damage of this weapon instead of your normal unarmed attack damage.
You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. When you roll a 20 with this magic weapon, the target takes an extra 7 slashing damage.
Proficiency: simple, knuckles Source: Acquisitions Incorporated p. 149, Player's Handbook (2014) p. 149
